title: Happy the Man - Retrospective
description:
Happy the Man - Retrospective Very rare collection from the ultimate unknown US prog band from the 70&#039;s. Featuring  (But not all at one time or on any one track, some players came and went, but all are featured on this disc.) Kit Watkins, Michael Beck, Rick Kennell, Ron Riddle, Coco Roussel, Stanley Witaker and Frank Wyatt.

Selected tracks from "Happy the Man" (1977), "Crafty Hands" (1978) and "Better Late..." (1983)

Track listing:

1. Service With A Smile (Riddle/Hawks) 2:42
2. Morning Sun (Watkins) 4:04
3. Starborne (Watkins) 4:32
4. Stumpy Meets The Firecracker In Stencil Forest (Whitaker) 4:20
5. Carousel (Wyatt) 4:02
6. Knee Bitten Nymphs In Limbo (Whitaker) 5:22
7. Steaming Pipes (Whitaker) 5:20
8. Wind Up Doll Day Wind (Watkins, Whitaker, Wyatt) 7:10
9. Open Book (Wyatt) 4:53
10. I Forgot To Push It (Watkins) 3:04
11. Hidden Moods (Watkins) 3:41
12. New York Dream&#039;s Suite (Wyatt) 8:29
13. Eye Of The Storm (Watkins) 3:57
14. At The Edge Of This Thought (Wyatt) 5:17
15. While Chrome Yellow Shine (Wyatt/Watkins) 6:11
